abstract: Fresh off his record-breaking appearance at the Beijing Olympics, Michael Phelps briefly enlivened a slow summer day at JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: Fresh off his record-breaking appearance at the Beijing Olympics, Michael Phelps briefly enlivened a slow summer day at JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Correction appended: Hot off his record-shattering eight-gold-medal Olympics appearance in Beijing, Michael Phelps has been making the rounds, talking about his accomplishments (and his lucrative forthcoming endorsements).

headline.main: Phelps Makes a Splash at JPMorgan
